        public SpamdClient(SpamdClient.ACTION action,
                   byte[] email)
            throws ConnectException,
                   UnknownHostException,
                   IOException
        Parameters:
        action - Spamd action
        email - email message to check
        Throws:
        ConnectException - if any error connecting to Spamd occurs
        IOException - if any IO error occurs
        UnknownHostException - if unable to resolve hostname

                   SpamdClient.ACTION action,
                   byte[] email)
            throws ConnectException,
                   UnknownHostException,
                   IOException
        Parameters:
        hostname - IP address or hostname to connect to Spamassassin daemon
        action - Spamd action
        email - email message to check
        Throws:
        ConnectException - if any error connecting to Spamd occurs
        IOException - if any IO error occurs
        UnknownHostException - if unable to resolve hostname

      • SpamdClient

        public SpamdClient(String hostname,
                   int port,
                   SpamdClient.ACTION action,
                   byte[] email)
            throws ConnectException,
                   UnknownHostException,
                   IOException
        Parameters:
        hostname - IP address or hostname to connect to Spamassassin daemon
        port - network port to use when connecting to Spamassassin daemon
        action - Spamd action
        email - email message to check
        Throws:
        ConnectException - if any error connecting to Spamd occurs
        IOException - if any IO error occurs
        UnknownHostException - if unable to resolve hostname
